channel.title: How do I change exp gain?
channel.description: Hi, I want to change the amount of xp you get when you do damage with range. For example I want to make it so you get 1,000 xp per every damage in range in you do. Do you know how I can do that? I use DemonScape v.3 source.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 11:42:36 AM[/size][hr]Bump Up My Post

item.title: How do I change exp gain?
item.dc:creator: @darblos darblos
